headline: Intuitive Surgical’s Cardiac Approval Expands Da Vinci 5 Growth Story
summary: Intuitive Surgical (NasdaqGS:ISRG) received U.S. FDA clearance for its da Vinci 5 system for specific minimally invasive cardiac procedures. The new indication includes uses such as mitral valve repair and certain cardiac revascularization surgeries. This clearance marks an expansion of da Vinci 5 into an area traditionally dominated by open heart surgery. Intuitive Surgical, known for its da Vinci robotic systems used in minimally invasive procedures, now has formal FDA clearance to...

headline: 1 Reason I'd Buy Intuitive Surgical Stock and Never Sell
summary: Intuitive Surgical's flagship product helps surgeons with a broad range of procedures.
